translations: 乌合之众；暴民；下层社会；（搅炼用的）长柄耙
聚众闹事；用长柄耙搅拌

sentences.sentence: Critics have accused him of rabble-rousing.
sentences.translation: 评论家指责他煽动暴力。

sentences.sentence: He seems to attract a rabble of supporters more loyal to the man than to the cause.
sentences.translation: 他似乎吸引了一群忠于他个人超过忠于事业的乱糟糟的拥护者。

sentences.sentence: He made himself so killingly funny that he was the envy and admiration of the whole mangy rabble.
sentences.translation: 他把自己弄得那么滑稽可笑，弄得所有肮脏的歹徒都既嫉妒又钦佩。
